Package soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.gcSolver

Class AbstractReferenceCountingGarbageCollector<N,​D,​A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.gcSolver.AbstractGarbageCollector<N,​D,​A>
      • soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.gcSolver.AbstractReferenceCountingGarbageCollector<N,​D,​A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGarbageCollector<N,​D>, IGarbageCollectorPeer<A>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FineGrainedReferenceCountingGarbageCollector, MethodLevelReferenceCountingGarbageCollector
    public abstract class AbstractReferenceCountingGarbageCollector<N,​D,​A>
extends AbstractGarbageCollector<N,​D,​A>
implements IGarbageCollectorPeer<A>
    Abstract base class for garbage collectors based on reference counting
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

        public void setMethodThreshold​(int threshold)

      • setPeerGroup

        public void setPeerGroup​(GarbageCollectorPeerGroup<A> peerGroup)
        Sets the peer group in which this solver operates. Peer groups are used to synchronize active dependencies between multiple solvers.
        Parameters:
        peerGroup - The peer group

      • setCheckChangeCounter

        public void setCheckChangeCounter​(boolean checkChangeCounter)
        Sets whether the change counter shall be checked when identifying active method dependencies
        Parameters:
        checkChangeCounter - True to ensure consistency using change counters, false otherwise
